title: r/AmITheA**hole For Making My Young Daughter Live On The Streets?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP discovers her young daughter being incredibly rude to a homeless man. OP decides to show her daughter some tough love by forcing her to live outside in their yard in a tent for a night. This proves to be a very eye-opening experience, and the daughter does a 180 in how she treats homeless people. However, OP's family members believe that OP crossed the line. So, is OP the butthole here?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
